name: Kelp Eel
description: A huge plant creature resembling kelp, capable of grappling and controlling movement in its vicinity.
memorable: Its ability to dissolve into kelp and reform after being destroyed is unique and can create difficult terrain.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and control the battlefield through grappling.
relations: Related to aquatic plants and creatures that inhabit underwater environments.
environment: Usually found in aquatic environments or kelp forests.
strengths: Exceptional hit points and damage resistance to acid, bludgeoning, and piercing.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its combat tactics; vulnerable to removal of its kelp components.
attacks: Multiattack with kelp tendrils that can grapple from a distance and inflict suffocation damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to disperse into kelp when reduced to 0 hit points, creating difficult terrain.
senses: Has blindsight 90 ft., allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can pull grappled creatures toward itself with the Reel action.
Indistinguishable from ordinary kelp when motionless, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
Ability to reform with half its hit points if less than half its kelp is removed after dispersing.
test_queries: aquatic creature that dissolves into kelp
plant creature with high hit points
